title: Are refunds possible?
body:
My guess is no but I decided that I want to wait to buy the RP for project ashe, but already did it, if I submit a ticket is there a chance I could get a refund?

EDIT: I mean a legitimate money refund, not RP. I know I can refund the RP, but I want my actual money back. Is that possible?

replies.body:
Since this is a *billing specific* question pertaining to your account, I recommend reaching out to our billing team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our specialists will be able to work with you one on one and see if there's anything we can do.

Let me know if you have any questions.
